description:
Brian is active duty military and he wasn't very comfortable with talking about his personal life on film.
But I bet this 24-year-old muscle stud is really fun in bed!
If he's half as energetic with a sexual partner as he is by himself then whomever he hooks up with is in for some fun!
Brian has a beautiful musculature and he loves to show it off.
"I flex all the time," he told us. "All the time. In front of the mirror, in front of other people, out the window of the car!"
His favorite time to flex? Right after he jerks off.
"Right after I jerk off I get the best pump," he said. It feels great!"
The most impressive thing about Brian is how much he cums. It's all over the fucking place!
title: Brian
